channel.title: Dodian source 7.0 (my style)
channel.description:
It is Clean, clean source, but with lots of glitches lol. It's really named Kidzscape but I left the source name as Devolution V7 cause It was that. It has almost nothing, that's why it's a clean source. Just made lots of stuff, no npc's except 1 though!
Features: # Base for anything! # Everyone can do ::pickup! # Lots of tree's work # Added Following on player better # Decompiled some files, added NPC.java to acctually good enough to read! # Int's and Booleans declared # Base for In-Game Item ID search # Char deleter # Handlers made for less space and lag # Perfect Wilderness levels # Wild levels are right # Once you click run it you auto run! # Fixed emotes! # HeadIcons will work above head # Prayer works 100% # Following works! # Pking Working! # Perfect Teleporting # Ranging has projectiles & drawback # Drops made for some # 1 NPC only # Duping methods gone, couldn't show all.
Pictures
[img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/5163/pic1nr4.png[/img] [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/2494/pic2bj8.png[/img] Next version with client (Thanks to `Rich for Picture!) [img]http://img522.imageshack.us/img522/7959/starterzu1.png[/img]
Video's: No more duping method: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VwARQ49AKSg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VwARQ49AKSg[/url] Prayer working 100%: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vvd4_K-Nw3s]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vvd4_K-Nw3s[/url]
Download Links: [url=http://uppit.com/QQWBRW]http://uppit.com/QQWBRW[/url] Only Download with has no wait time or anything, it's faster than Uppit! [url=http://www.files.to/get/410121/xq9hh7drlg]http://www.files.to/get/410121/xq9hh7drlg[/url]
Credits: [CODE] 45% to Bakatool 5% to dodian for the base 25% to me for editing and making some animations and lowering lagg. 25% to `Kidz as we started again, he gave me prayer headicons, and help with client. 1% extra to Linux on r-s cause he got the ints and booleans which I was missing. [/CODE]
FAQ: Q.Is this A Completely wiped out NPC's and Almost Objects that weren't needed source: A: Yes.
Q: Why is it ::pickup for all? A: Because source is not that cool, because of no NPC's
Q: Is there following working? A: Yes, EDIT: edited download and fixed following a little bit more.
Q: What do I press to follow? A: Ethier "Trade With" or "Follow" your choice.
Q: Did you Use JavaScript to make somethings random? A: As a matter of fact, I did I was thinking how do I make random things appear, and found out javascript can help me.
Q: What do you use to Edit and Capture your Videos? A: I use GTK - Recordmydesktop for recording and there is no good editor yet for ubuntu.
Q: What software do you use to code? A: I use Windows any version (Just not Vista) and Ubuntu 8.04
Q: Will you be putting up tutorials for Server coding that aren't leeched? A: Yes, I am finishing some tut's, But some you will have to figure on your own.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Thanks Please if you downloaded Comment!

item.title: Dodian source 7.0 (my style)
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

[quote=“Burning Ash, post:33, topic:233235”]Go Kill Youself?
Show’s how mature you are.
I joined in 2009 because I’m from |7Run3S3rv3|7r
To be quite honest, I don’t really have to prove anything to you. It’s like asking me to ride a bike. I don’t have to do anything I don’t want to do. You can keep telling yourself all of these things. But in the end who really wins in your mind. Obviously you, but think about reality. You try, you fail, end of story.

Go Kill Yourself[/quote] That made me laugh. Like I said before. You’re only 15 years old talking trash to me. Why don’t you grow up, and in about 3 years, then you can talk to me. Before then, just stop talking and everything will be alright. Thank you, have a nice day.

Typical childish statements you make.

“You fail”

I knew you wouldn’t support anything you said. You got nothing to prove? So then why are you going around blindly judging people.

I’m 15? You obviously don’t know how old I am. You’re lack of knowledge obviously proves you’re under 16.

“Go kill yourself” is an immature statement? Too be honest, I meant what I said. It wasn’t trying to be funny. I actually meant for you to go get your daddy’s pistol and shoot yourself.

Let’s look at your sig.

“My irl name is Fallen
Im 18
I party all night
I code all day.
The Important thing is just to have a good time while doing it all. :]”

Nice name.

You’re 18? I hardly think so by your grammar and lack of knowledge of common human psychology.

You party all night? If you’re 18, I hardly doubt you party at all. And if you do it just PROVES that you’re the immature one.

How about getting a job, supporting a wife and paying bills? A concept you obviously don’t understand.

“I Code all day.” I highly doubt this as you don’t even know the correct terminology for your ‘hobby.’

Once again, you failed to answer questions. You dodged them, like I said you would. I even predicted your immature post.

You failed to acquire any knowledge to back up ANYTHING you’ve said in the past.

I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again, and I’m being quite literal.

Go KILL yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian source 7.0 (my style)
item.dc:creator: @Burning_Ash Burning Ash
item.description:
@Burning_Ash wrote:

Go Kill Youself?
Show’s how mature you are.
I joined in 2009 because I’m from |7Run3S3rv3|7r
To be quite honest, I don’t really have to prove anything to you. It’s like asking me to ride a bike. I don’t have to do anything I don’t want to do. You can keep telling yourself all of these things. But in the end who really wins in your mind. Obviously you, but think about reality. You try, you fail, end of story.

Go Kill Yourself
That made me laugh. Like I said before. You're only 15 years old talking trash to me. Why don't you grow up, and in about 3 years, then you can talk to me. Before then, just stop talking and everything will be alright. Thank you, have a nice day.

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian source 7.0 (my style)
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

[quote=“Burning Ash, post:31, topic:233235”][quote author=k a h leader link=topic=307575.msg2807629#msg2807629 date=1243810592]

Sorry this Fails.
Good try

Sorry you fail. You’re just spamming up the forums.

Take a look at this.

You’re comments aren’t even constructive enough.

They are just ignorant and uneducated.

So happy spamming.

Go kill yourself.

[/quote]

I’m uneducated?
Haha. I guess since you said that, I’m going to go kill myself.
I’m pretty sure you’re only about 15, and you have no clue what you’re talking about.
I’m probably one of the best coders on here.
No, I don’t release any of my servers. But why would I release to you failed little kids, when all you’re going to do is leech and say, “Oh look, I coded everything in this! Yay me! Give me credits, oh btw, Burning gets 1% of credits because he made the base!” Yea ermm no I’ll pass on that? You need to grow up and smell the coffee little boy. This isnt just a game to me. This is my job, and when I see crap. I tell the truth about it. When you get better than me one day. Then maybe you can say I fail, but for now.
Sorry to say, but you fail.
Gtfo.[/quote]

  1. You joined in 2009.

  2. You have nothing to support your blind statement.

  3. I rarely post so how would you know what I’m capable of.

  4. “I’m probably one of the best coders on here.”
    That joke wasn’t very funny. (LMAO)

  5. When I get as good as you? You’re an idiot. Prove to me. Show me something you’re pro at. Because like you said, it’s your job.

  6. You don’t release because you’re afraid of leeching? That isn’t the mentality of a good coder programmer.

Obviously you can’t even get a term right.

Do you use IDEs? Or do you still compile your shit programs with a bat. file?

Do you use noob programs like eclipse to run your server?

You have no idea what you’re talking about.

Program something worthwhile. Message it too me. If you can’t, then you’re just a failure.

If it’s a server, I’ve been around since 2006 so I know the framework from all the servers floating around. So if you even attempt to leech one, I will post picture of leeched code and prove that you know nothing.

Also here’s a tip.

If you use ‘if’ statements when ‘switch’ statements are meant to be used, I won’t laugh as hard.

HA!

Yep you will probably post something immature to try and defend yourself. But honestly, a lot of mopar already sees through your crap.

Go kill yourself.

Read full topic
